words.source: H853 conj. + direct object marker; untranslated in English versions
H4971 n.fs construct מַתְכֹּנֶת 'measurement, quota'; KJV 'the tale of', ESV 'the number of', NASB 'the quota of'
H3843 def. art. + n.fp לְבֵנָה 'brick'; KJV 'bricks', ESV 'bricks', NASB 'bricks'
H834 rel. pron. 'which, that'; all trans. agree
H1992 indep. pron. 3mp הֵם 'they'; all trans. agree
H6213 Qal ptc. mp of עָשָׂה 'to do, make'; KJV 'did make', ESV 'made', NASB 'were making'
H8543 adv. תְּמוֹל 'yesterday, formerly'; KJV 'heretofore', ESV 'in the past', NASB 'previously'
H8032 adv. שִׁלְשׁוֹם 'formerly'; idiom with תְּמוֹל = 'previously'; all trans. agree
H7760 Qal impf. 2mp of שִׂים 'to put, set'; KJV 'ye shall lay', ESV 'you shall impose', NASB 'you shall impose'
H5921 prep. עַל + 3mp suff. 'upon them'; all trans. agree
H3808 neg. particle; all trans. agree
H1639 Qal impf. 2mp of גָּרַע 'to diminish, reduce'; KJV 'ye shall not diminish', ESV 'you shall by no means reduce', NASB 'you are not to reduce'
H4480 prep. מִן + 3ms suff. 'from it'; KJV 'thereof', ESV 'it', NASB 'any of it'
H3588 conj. כִּי 'for, because'; KJV 'for', ESV 'for', NASB 'for'
H7503 Niphal ptc. mp of רָפָה 'to be slack, idle'; KJV 'idle', ESV 'idle', NASB 'lazy'
H1992 indep. pron. 3mp הֵם 'they'; all trans. agree
H5921 prep. 'upon, on account of'; forms idiom with כֵּן
H3651 adv. 'so, thus'; עַל כֵּן = 'therefore'; KJV 'therefore', ESV 'therefore', NASB 'therefore'
H1992 indep. pron. 3mp הֵם 'they'; all trans. agree
H6817 Qal ptc. mp of צָעַק 'to cry out'; KJV 'they cry', ESV 'they cry', NASB 'they cry out'
H559 prep. l- + Qal inf. constr. of אָמַר 'to say'; KJV 'saying', ESV 'saying', NASB 'saying'
H3212 Qal cohortative 1cp of הָלַךְ 'to go'; KJV 'let us go', ESV 'let us go', NASB 'let us go'
H2076 Qal cohortative 1cp of זָבַח 'to sacrifice'; KJV 'sacrifice', ESV 'sacrifice', NASB 'sacrifice'
H430 prep. l- + n.mp construct + 1cp suff. of אֱלֹהִים 'God'; KJV 'to our God', ESV 'to our God', NASB 'to our God'
